# directoryState

**Instance Property**

The state of the directory.

## Declaration

```swift
var directoryState: GSSyncedDirectoryState { get }
```

## Accessing a directory

- **open(forContainerIdentifier:)**: Requests an instance of the game-save directory.
- **GSSyncedDirectoryState**: Represents the state and its associated properties of the directory
